# Die for Your Master (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 4]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your animal companion, familiar, or fiendish servant

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Animal Archive, pg. 24

This spell allows your companion or familiar to intercept any attack that targets you, including those that do not require attack rolls (e.g., *[[Chain Lightning (Spell)|chain lightning]], [[Hold Monster (Spell)|hold monster]],* and* [[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]]*).

Your companion or familiar cannot intercept effects that do not affect creatures of its type (e.g., *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*).
